page.title: 09ST.SWITHUNS SCHOOL, SANDY
page.content: OUR SCHOOL IS A LARGE BUILDING, IT HAS 5 CLASSROOMS AND 8 OTHER ROOMS. THERE ARE APPROXIMATELY 150 PEOPLE AT THE SCHOOL INCLUDING THE STAFF. WE HAVE A HEADMISTRESS AND A DEPUTY HEADMISTRESS. THE SCHOOL WAS BUILT IN 1868 AND OPENED IN 1869. IT USED TO BE A CHURCH SCHOOL, BUT IS NOW RUN BY THE BEDFORDSHIRE EDUCATION AUTHORITY. THE CHILDREN ARE AGED BETWEEN 5 AND 9 YEARS. WE HAVE A LARGE PLAYGROUND BUT NO FIELD. WHEN IT IS SPORTS DAY WE GO TO ANOTHER SCHOOL IN SANDY. THE HALL IS SEPARATE FROM THE MAIN BUILDING, SO ARE THE TOILETS. WE USE THE HALL FOR DINNERS AND THE KITCHEN IS JOINED ON TO IT. THERE ARE AFTER SCHOOL CLUBS INCLUDING SCIENCE, ART AND CRAFT, COUNTRY DANCING, NEEDLEWORK, BOYS AND GIRLS GAMES, AND ALSO FOOTBALL CLUB ON A SATURDAY.
